metadata.title: Products & Services | Quantum NIL
metadata.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive range of nano-fabrication services and solutions.

items.title: Grating Fabrication for DFB/VCSEL Epitaxy Wafer
Photonic Crystal Fabrication
details: Photonic crystal & photonic quasi-crystal design simulation

items.title: Production Scale of NIL (2" ~ 8" wafer size)
details: Fragile & bowling wafers can be applied

items.title: E-beam Lithography & Photo Lithography
details: High-end E-beam tool for NIL mold/master fabrication
Process alignment mark fabrication by both of NIL and photo-litho
Crystalline alignment along the major flat of wafers: < 0.02o

items.title: Material Etch
details: Dedicated dry etch tools for different materials
Dry etch thickness variation within wafers: +/- 3nm
Possesses both of dry and wet etch
